title: this bug
body: can riot please fix the bug splat everytime i begin a game it always end up either crashing or saying my director card is not working

replies.body:
That bug splat is a sign that something is going wrong with your system files, possibly caused by an issue we [**recently started tracking**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues). If what you saw was a "DirectX not working" message, then that may very well be the case here. I'd suggest trying to reset your config files to make sure this isn't the case. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
